meanings.sent2: His volitive nature allowed him to choose his own path in life.
meanings.sent3: The cat's volitive behavior of choosing which toy to play with amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The artist's volitive brush strokes created a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The student's volitive determination to succeed was evident in her hard work.
